channel.title: WMHelp.com news channel
channel.description: WMHelp.com is an international team of software developers

item.title: XMLPad 2.0 is available for download.
item.description: The second version of popular XML editor - XMLPad 2.0 is available for download. With almost twice smaller setup the new version contains a lot of new features in addition to new improved XML parser...

item.title: <xml:Pad/> is available for download.
item.description: <xml:Pad/> is a small yet powerful XML editor based on the unique custom-developed XML parser engine designed in accordance with the published W3C standards by WMHelp.com. <xml:Pad/> is a basic version of the WMHelp.com eGenerator development solution, distributed under the freeware license.

item.title: WMHelp.com changing colocation.
item.description: WMHelp.com will be unavailable due to change the colocation provider. The mail will work on the mirror site, so you may be able to contact with support. Sorry for any inconvinience.

item.title: EDI SEFViewer is not available for purchase anymore.
item.description: WMHelp.com will be unavailable due to change the colocation provider. The mail will work on the mirror site, so you may be able to contact with support. Sorry for any inconvinience.

item.title: EDI SEFViewer is avaialble for download.
item.description: WMHelp.com SEF Viewer is used to simplify the use and access to EDI (Electronic Data Interchange) standard structures distributed in SEF (Standard Exchange Format) file.

item.title: WMHelp.com is opened.
item.description: WMHelp.com is an international team of software developers providing solutions for enterprise software development. Our mission is to build tools and components that foster the creativity of developers without imposing undue burdens on their ability to meet deadlines, design "killer" apps, and achieve their personal goals and objectives. Creating friendly, fast and complete solutions is the basic WMHelp.com principle.
